data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Rural areas in the U.S. were once areas that produced a lot of food. However, ____ are ____ fewer ____ now ____ there ____ to ____. The ____ reason ____ this ____ is ____ farmers ____ paid ____ low ____ for ____ produce. Moreover, over the past five years alone, sales of agricultural goods have dropped by 12%, which is a very high rate.
data.partBlankContent: Rural areas in the U.S. were once areas that produced a lot of food. However, th___ are f__ fewer far____ now th__ there us__ to b_. The ma__ reason f__ this dec____ is th__ farmers a__ paid relat_____ low wa___ for th___ produce. Moreover, over the past five years alone, sales of agricultural goods have dropped by 12%, which is a very high rate.
data.answer: 美国的农村地区曾经是生产大量食物的地区。然而，现在的农民比过去少多了。这种下降的主要原因是农民从他们的产品中得到的报酬相对较低。此外，仅在过去五年中，农产品的销售额就下降了12%，这是一个非常高的比率。
